title: Hitman's Girl: Eric's Love Story
description: Operating under the radar, and two steps ahead of the law, this former Army Ranger Scout Sniper must utilize every skill he learned in war to do something he never anticipated. Instead of taking lives, he finds himself risking his to save another.Powerful people left her for dead. He picked up the pieces and foiled everything, including his own survival rules.His heroic misdeeds have trampled on the turf of South Floridaâ€™s notorious Nightshade crime syndicate.Left with no option to battle his enemies alone, he must join forces with Nightshade to rescue the girl he loves.
author: Lynessa Layne
